text: Jack Kevin Haley (January 27, 1964 â€“ March 16, 2015) was an American professional basketball player. He played for the Chicago Bulls, New Jersey Nets, Los Angeles Lakers, and San Antonio Spurs. Haley was born in Long Beach, California. Haley died of heart disease in Los Alamitos, California, aged 51. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Chicago Bulls players Category:Los Angeles Lakers players Category:New Jersey Nets players Category:San Antonio Spurs players Category:Sportspeople from Los Angeles County, California
title: Jack Haley (basketball)
